content.raw: yes as @scpeters suggested, we run `docker build -t fcomputer:latest [githuburl]` on start up to build your docker image. So you can also try that manually. Once that's built, there is a script, `~/code/cloudsim-sim/src_commands/fc_run_team_docker.bash`, that we execute to run the docker container
content.html: yes as @scpeters suggested, we run docker build -t fcomputer:latest [githuburl] on start up to build your docker image. So you can also try that manually. Once that's built, there is a script, ~/code/cloudsim-sim/src_commands/fc_run_team_docker.bash, that we execute to run the docker container
